metadata.title: SATINIOR 6 Pieces No Buckle Stretch Belt Elastic Invisible Buckless Belt for Jeans Pants
features: What you can receive: this package includes 6 pieces no buckle stretch belts with round buttons, there are 6 colors for you to choose, 1 piece for each color, enough quantity for your wearing
Elastic belt: The minimum length of the belt that does not stretch the waist circumference is 32 inch, maximum when the belt is stretched 50 inch

Comfortable belt: each stretchy belt is made of elastic belt and artificial leather which is flexible and soft, can bring your a comfortable feeling of wearing and make you feel less pressure and relaxed in casual time

Invisible design: our elastic belts comes with invisible design which make it convenient and easy to take on and off, with solid snap, it will not easy to fall off and rust, practical enough for your daily use

Available occasions: these elastic invisible buckless belts can be applied for matching with your pants and jeans, and make your life more easier and save your a lot of time, you an also give it to the person who you concern as a nice gift
description: Feature:  Buckleless design: With a very beautiful buckleless design, these elastic belts can save you much time and provide you convenience to your daily life, it will brings you a comfortable feeling when you wear it.  Light and thin texture: We provide you with flexible no buckle belts which is lightweight and elastic without worrying about it binding your waist after eating, soft and durable for using a long time.  Specification: Minimum length: approx.22 inches Maximum length: approx.36 inches Color: black, coffee, brown, dark blue, bright blue, khaki  Package includes: 6 x No buckle elastic belts  Note: Please stay away from chemicals, can be machine washed or hand washed, do not bleach. Please wash the product with cold water. Winding risk may exist, please keep it away from kids. Manual measurement, please allow slight errors on size. The colors may exist slight difference due to different screens.
